name: inara-global-staff-platform
description: Unified Digital Workplace for All INARA Staff Worldwide

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && (test -d node_modules || npm install) && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run db:generate && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
